DescribeDownloadBackupSetStorageInfo.summary: Queries the storage information of a downloaded backup set.

schema.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides.

The validity period of the URL that is used as the download destination. Take note of the following items:

*   Default value: 7200. This means that the URL is valid for 2 hours by default.
*   Valid values: 300 to 86400. Unit: seconds. This means that you can specify a validity period in the range of 5 minutes to 1 day.
*   Before you specify this parameter, convert the validity period to seconds. For example, if you want to set the validity period of the URL to 5 minutes, enter 300.

The ID of the instance.

> The **BackupSetId** parameter is required if you specify the **InstanceName** parameter.

The download task ID.

*   The **BackupSetId** and **InstanceName** parameters are required if you do not specify the **TaskId** parameter.
*   To view the download task ID, go to the instance details page in the console and click **Backup and Restoration** in the left-side navigation pane. On the **Backup Download** tab, view the task ID.
The ID of the backup set.
The response parameters.

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values:

*   **true**: The request was successful.
*   **false**: The request failed.

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request failed.
ErrMessage.example: Argument: regionCode Must not be empty

Code.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

Message.description: The error message returned if the request failed.
Message.example: Argument: regionCode Must not be empty

PublicUrl.description: The public download URL of the backup set.

PrivateUrl.description: The private download URL of the backup set.

ExpirationTime.description:
The validity period of the URL.

> This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

DescribeDownloadBackupSetStorageInfo.title: DescribeDownloadBackupSetStorageInfo
DescribeDownloadBackupSetStorageInfo.description:
### [](#)Supported database engines

*   ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL that uses Enterprise SSDs (ESSDs)
*   RDS PostgreSQL
*   PolarDB for MySQL

### [](#)References

*   [Download the backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance](~~98819~~)
*   [Download the backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance](~~96774~~)
*   [Download the backup files of a PolarDB for MySQL cluster](~~2627635~~)

DescribeDownloadSupport.summary: Queries whether an instance supports the advanced download feature.

schema.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides. You can call the [DescribeDBInstanceAttribute](~~26231~~) operation to query the region ID of the instance.
The ID of the instance.
The response parameters.

Data.description:
Indicates whether the advanced download feature is supported. Valid values:

*   **true**: The advanced download feature is supported.
*   **false**: The advanced download feature is not supported.

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values:

*   **true**: The request was successful.
*   **false**: The request failed.

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request failed.
ErrMessage.example: Argument: regionCode Must not be empty

Code.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

Message.description: The error message returned if the request failed.
Message.example: Argument: regionCode Must not be empty

DescribeDownloadSupport.responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Data": "true", "RequestId": "F1A186F7-7B34-5C11-A903-EE23876B****", "ErrCode": "DBS.ParamIsInValid", "Success": "true", "ErrMessage": "Argument: regionCode Must not be empty", "Code": "DBS.ParamIsInValid", "Message": "Argument: regionCode Must not be empty" }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" F1A186F7-7B34-5C11-A903-EE23876B**** true Success true Success ","errorExample":""}]
DescribeDownloadSupport.title: DescribeDownloadSupport
DescribeDownloadSupport.description:
### [](#)Supported database engines

*   ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL
*   ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL
*   PolarDB for MySQL

### [](#)References

You can create an advanced download task by point in time or backup set. You can set the download destination to a URL or directly upload the downloaded backup set to your Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket to facilitate data analysis and offline archiving.

*   [Download the backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance](~~98819~~)
*   [Download the backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance](~~96774~~)
*   [Download the backup files of a PolarDB for MySQL cluster](~~2627635~~)

CreateDownload.summary: Creates an advanced download task for an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance, an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance, or a PolarDB for MySQL cluster.

schema.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides. You can call the [DescribeDBInstanceAttribute](~~26231~~) operation to query the region ID of the instance.
The ID of the instance.

The type of the download task. Valid values:

*   **full**: downloads a full backup set.
*   **pitr**: downloads a backup set at a specific point in time.

The ID of the backup set. You can call the [DescribeBackups](~~26273~~) operation to query the ID of the backup set.

> This parameter is required if the BakSetType parameter is set to full.

The point in time at which the backup set is downloaded. Specify a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

> This parameter is required if the BakSetType parameter is set to pitr.
The size of the full backup set. Unit: bytes. You can call the [DescribeBackups](~~26273~~) operation to query the size of the full backup set.

The format to which the downloaded backup set is converted. Valid values:

*   **CSV**
*   **SQL**
*   **Parquet**

> This parameter is required.

The type of the destination to which the backup set is downloaded. Valid values:

*   **OSS**
*   **URL**

The name of the OSS bucket that is used to store the backup set.

*   This parameter is required if the TargetType parameter is set to OSS.
*   Make sure that your account is granted the **AliyunDBSDefaultRole** permission. For more information, see [Use RAM for resource authorization](~~26307~~). You can also grant permissions based on the operation instructions in the Resource Access Management (RAM) console.

The destination path to which the backup set is downloaded.

> This parameter is required if the TargetType parameter is set to OSS.

The region in which the OSS bucket resides.

> This parameter is required if the TargetType parameter is set to OSS.
The response parameters.

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values:

*   **true**: The request was successful.
*   **false**: The request failed.

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request failed.

Message.description: The error message returned if the request failed.

Data.description: The information about the download task.

BakSetId.description: The ID of the full backup set.

DownloadStatus.description:
The state of the download task. Valid values:

*   initializing: The download task was being initialized.
*   queuing: The download task was queuing.
*   running: The download task was running.
*   failed: The download task failed.
*   finished: The download task was complete.
*   expired: The download task expired.

> If the TargetType parameter is set to URL, the download task expires in three days after the task is complete.

Progress.description:
The number of tables that have been downloaded and the total number of tables to be downloaded.

> If the task is in the preparation stage, 0/0 is returned.

BackupSetTime.description: The point in time of the backup set if the task is used to download a backup set at a specific point in time. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

RegionCode.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides.

TargetPath.description:
The destination path to which the backup set is downloaded.

>  This parameter is returned if the value of **TargetType is OSS**.

DbList.description: The database and table information that is returned if databases and tables are filtered by the download task.

ExportDataSize.description: The size of the downloaded data. Unit: bytes.

ImportDataSize.description: The size of the processed data. Unit: bytes.

GmtCreate.description: The time when the download task was created. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

TaskId.description: The ID of the download task.

Format.description: The format to which the downloaded data is converted.

TargetType.description: The type of the destination to which the backup set is downloaded.

CreateDownload.responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "RequestId": "A08F908D-2C35-583F-93C1-ED80753F****", "ErrCode": "DBS.ParamIsInValid", "Success": "true", "ErrMessage": "formatType can not be empty", "Code": "DBS.ParamIsInValid", "Message": "formatType can not be empty", "Data": { "BakSetId": "146005****", "DownloadStatus": "initializing", "Progress": "0/0", "BackupSetTime": 1661373070000, "RegionCode": "cn-beijing", "TargetPath": "test_db/path", "DbList": "testdb", "ExportDataSize": 0, "ImportDataSize": 0, "GmtCreate": 1661940917570, "TaskId": "dt-qxnsfq5s****", "Format": "CSV", "TargetType": "URL" } }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" A08F908D-2C35-583F-93C1-ED80753F**** 0/0 1661373070000 dt-qxnsfq5s**** cn-beijing 0 146005**** 1661940917570 csv initializing 0 URL Success true Success ","errorExample":""}]
CreateDownload.title: CreateDownload
CreateDownload.description:
### [](#)Supported database engines

*   ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL
*   ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL
*   PolarDB for MySQL

### [](#)References

For the instances that meet your business requirements, you can create an advanced download task by point in time or backup set. You can set the download destination to a URL or directly upload the downloaded backup set to your Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket to facilitate data analysis and offline archiving.

*   [Download the backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance](~~98819~~)
*   [Download the backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance](~~96774~~)
*   [Download the backup files of a PolarDB for MySQL cluster](~~2627635~~)

DescribeDownloadTask.summary: Queries the advanced download tasks for an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance, an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance, or a PolarDB for MySQL cluster.

schema.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides. You can call the [DescribeDBInstanceAttribute](~~26231~~) operation to query the region ID of the instance.

The ID of the instance.

> This parameter is required.
The ID of the Database Backup (DBS) data source. Specify the parameter in the format of *ds-${Instance ID}\_${regionId}*.
The ID of the backup set generated when you create a download task. You can call the [DescribeBackups](~~26273~~) operation to query the ID.

The state of the download task. Valid values:

*   **Initializing**: The download task is being initialized.
*   **queueing**: The download task is queuing.
*   **running**: The download task is running.
*   **failed**: The download task fails.
*   **finished**: The download task is complete.
*   **expired**: The download task expires.

The type of the download task. Valid values:

*   **full**: downloads a full backup set.
*   **pitr**: downloads a backup set at a specific point in time.
The beginning of the time range to query. Specify this parameter as a timestamp of the LONG type. Unit: milliseconds.
The end of the time range to query. Specify this parameter as a timestamp of the LONG type. Unit: milliseconds.
The number of entries to return on each page.
The page number of the page to return.

The order in which you want to sort the entries. Valid values:

*   **asc**: the ascending order.
*   **desc**: the descending order. This is the default value.
The column based on which the entries are sorted. By default, the entries are sorted by the time when the download task was created. Set the value to **gmt_create**.
The response parameters.

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request fails.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values:

*   **true**: The request was successful.
*   **false**: The request failed.

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request fails.

Code.description: The error code returned if the request fails.

Message.description: The error message returned if the request fails.

PageNumber.description: The page number of the returned page. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: 1.

TotalPages.description: The total number of returned pages.

Extra.description: The extra description of the download tasks.

TotalElements.description: The total number of full backup tasks.

PageSize.description: The number of entries returned per page.

items.description: The details of the download task.

RegionCode.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides.

Format.description:
The format to which the downloaded backup set is converted. Valid values:

*   **csv**
*   **SQL**
*   **Parquet**

BakSetId.description: The ID of the full backup set.

DownloadStatus.description:
The status of the download task. Valid values:

*   **Initializing**: The download task is being initialized.
*   **queuing**: The download task is queuing.
*   **running**: The download task is running.
*   **failed**: The download task fails.
*   **finished**: The download task is complete.
*   **expired**: The download task expires.

ExportDataSize.description: The amount of output data. Unit: bytes.

ImportDataSize.description: The amount of data that is processed. Unit: bytes.

BackupSetTime.description: The point in time of the backup set if the task is used to download a backup set at a specific point in time. The value is a timestamp of the LONG type. Unit: millisecond.

TargetType.description:
The type of the method in which the backup set is downloaded. Valid values:

*   **OSS**
*   **URL**

TargetPath.description: The destination path to which the data is downloaded if the value of **TargetType is OSS**.

Progress.description: The number of tables that have been downloaded and the total number of tables to be downloaded.

GmtCreate.description: The time when the download task was created. The value is a timestamp.

DescribeDownloadTask.responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "RequestId": "5D285EB9-A443-592D-9F3D-A888FAC3****", "ErrCode": "DBS.InternalError", "Success": "true", "ErrMessage": "instanceName can not be empty", "Code": "DBS.InternalError", "Message": "instanceName can not be empty", "Data": { "PageNumber": 1, "TotalPages": 2, "Extra": "dbtest", "TotalElements": 1, "PageSize": 10, "Content": { "List": [ { "TaskId": "dt-qxntlvgu****", "RegionCode": "cn-hangzhou", "Format": "csv", "DbList": "[dbtest]", "BakSetId": "148261****", "DownloadStatus": "queueing", "ExportDataSize": "0", "ImportDataSize": "0", "BackupSetTime": "1663162216000", "TargetType": "URL", "TargetPath": "test_db/path", "Progress": "0/0", "GmtCreate": "1663321957000" } ] } } }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" 5D285EB9-A443-592D-9F3D-A888FAC3**** 0 20 148261**** 0/0 1663321957000 dt-qxntlvgu**** csv 1663162216000 cn-hangzhou queueing 0 URL 0 148145**** 0/0 1663321935000 dt-uvbegmuc**** csv 1663055892000 cn-hangzhou running 0 URL 0 Success true Success ","errorExample":""}]
DescribeDownloadTask.title: DescribeDownloadTask
DescribeDownloadTask.description:
### [](#)Supported database engines

*   ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL
*   ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL
*   PolarDB for MySQL

### [](#)References

*   [Download the backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance](~~98819~~)
*   [Download the backup files of an ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance](~~96774~~)
*   [Download the backup files of a PolarDB for MySQL cluster](~~2627635~~)

ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Moves a resource from one resource group to another.

schema.description: The ID of the resource.
The ID of the resource group to which you want to move the resource.
The type of the resource. Set the value to backupplan.
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.
The region ID of the instance.

Data.description:
Indicates whether the resource was successfully moved. Valid values:

*   **true**: The resource was successfully moved.
*   **false**: The resource failed to be moved.

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values:

*   **true**: The request was successful.
*   **false**: The request failed.

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request failed.

Message.example: The resource group is forbidden to operate

ChangeResourceGroup.responseDemo:
[{"errorExample":"","example":"{
  "Data": "true",
  "RequestId": "04EBD9F5-F06F-5302-8499-005C72*******",

  "Success": "true",

  "Code": "Param.NotFound",
  "Message": "The resource group is forbidden to operate"

ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup

DescribeBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the information about the backup policy of a PolarDB for MySQL instance.

schema.title: 地域
schema.description: The region in which the backup set resides.

schema.title: 实例名
schema.description: The ID of the PolarDB for MySQL cluster.
The response parameters.

Data.description: The details of the backup policy.

PreferredBackupDate.title: 基础备份的备份周期
PreferredBackupDate.description: The backup cycle of a basic backup. The backup cycle is represented by a seven-digit string, which corresponds to the days of the week from Monday to Sunday. A value of 1 indicates that a basic backup is performed on that day, and a value of 0 indicates that no basic backup is performed on that day.

PreferredBackupWindowBegin.title: 基础备份窗口开始时间
PreferredBackupWindowBegin.description: The start time of a basic backup.

PreferredBackupWindow.title: 基础备份窗口
PreferredBackupWindow.description: The time period during which a basic backup is performed.

BackupRetentionPeriod.title: 基础备份保留时间，若开启高级备份策略，则为一级备份策略中得最长保留时间
BackupRetentionPeriod.description: The retention period of basic backup files. If an advanced backup policy is enabled, the value indicates the retention period of the level-1 backup policy.

BackupRetentionPolicyOnClusterDeletion.title:
已删除实例的归档备份保留策略。取值：
0：不保留
1：保留最后一个
2：全部保留
BackupRetentionPolicyOnClusterDeletion.description:
The policy that is used to retain the archived backup files if the instance is deleted. Valid values:

*   **NONE**: No archived backup file is retained.
*   **LATEST**: Only the latest archived backup file is retained.
*   **ALL**: All archived backup files are retained.

HighFrequencyBakInterval.title: 高频备份时间
HighFrequencyBakInterval.description: The interval for high-frequency backups. Unit: minutes. For example, a value of 120 indicates that a backup is performed every two hours.

BackupPriority.title:
备库备份的设置。返回值：
1：优先备库
2：强制主库
BackupPriority.description:
Indicates whether the secondary database is preferentially backed up. Valid values:

*   **1**: The secondary database is preferentially backed up.
*   **2**: Only the primary database is backed up.

>  This parameter is returned only for ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instances. If the instance runs a different database engine, **0** is returned.

EnableLogBackup.title: 是否开启日志备份
EnableLogBackup.description:
Indicates whether the log backup feature is enabled. Valid values:

*   **1**: The log backup feature is enabled.
*   **0**: The log backup feature is disabled.

LogBackupRetention.title: 日志备份保留周期
LogBackupRetention.description: The retention period of log backups.

LogBackupLocalRetentionNumber.title: 本地日志文件保留个数
LogBackupLocalRetentionNumber.description: The number of local binary log files that are retained.

EnableBackup.title: 是否开启备份
EnableBackup.description: Indicates whether the backup feature is enabled.

LocalLogRetentionSpace.title: 本地日志最大空间使用率。
LocalLogRetentionSpace.description: The maximum storage usage that is allowed for log files on the instance.

HighSpaceUsageProtection.title: 在磁盘水位过高时是否强制日志
HighSpaceUsageProtection.description:
Indicates whether logs are forcibly cleared if the storage usage of the instance is greater than 80% or the available storage space of the instance is smaller than 5 GB. Valid values:

*   **Disable**: Logs are not forcibly cleared.
*   **Enable**: Logs are forcibly cleared.

Category.title: 是否开启秒级备份，仅对MySQL生效
Category.description:
Indicates whether the second-granularity backup feature is enabled. Valid values:

*   **Flash**: The second-granularity backup feature is enabled.
*   **Standard**: The standard backup feature is enabled.

>  This parameter is returned only for MySQL instances.

IncBackupInterval.title: 高频增量备份间隔
IncBackupInterval.description: The interval for high-frequency incremental backups.

EnableIncBackup.title: 是否开启增量备份
EnableIncBackup.description: Indicates whether the incremental backup feature is enabled.

BackupMethod.title: 备份方式 S - 快照备份 P-物理备份
BackupMethod.description:
The method that is used to generate backup files. Valid values:

*   **Physical**: physical backup
*   **Snapshot**: snapshot backup

AdvanceLogPolicies.description: The details of log backup policies.

SrcType.title:
备份策略源类型
  db - 数据库
  level1 - 一级备份
  level2 - 二级备份
  level2Cross - 二级跨地域备份
SrcType.description:
The type of the data source of the backup policy. Valid values:

*   **db**: database
*   **level1**: level-1 backup
*   **level2**: level-2 backup
*   **level2Cross**: level-2 cross-region backup

SrcRegion.title: 备份策略源region
SrcRegion.description: The region in which the data source of the backup policy resides.

DestType.title:
备份策略目标类型
  db - 数据库
  level1 - 一级备份
  level2 - 二级备份
  level2Cross - 二级跨地域备份
DestType.description:
The storage method of backup files. Valid values:

*   **db**: database
*   **level1**: level-1 backup
*   **level2**: level-2 backup
*   **level2Cross**: level-2 cross-region backup

DestRegion.title: 备份策略目标region
DestRegion.description: The region in which the backup files are stored.

LogRetentionType.title:
日志备份保留类型
  Never - 永不过期
  Delay - 按天过期
LogRetentionType.description:
The retention type of log backups. Valid values:

*   **never**: Log backups never expire.
*   **delay**: Log backups are retained for a specific number of days.

LogRetentionValue.title: 日志备份保留时间
LogRetentionValue.description: The retention period of log backups.

AdvanceDataPolicies.description: The details of data backup policies.

PolicyId.title: 高级策略ID
PolicyId.description: The ID of the advanced backup policy.

FilterType.title:
高级策略筛选类型
   Crontab - 周期调度
   Event - 事件调度
FilterType.description:
The scheduling mode of the advanced backup policy. Valid values:

*   **crontab**: periodic scheduling
*   **event**: event-based scheduling

FilterKey.title:
调度类型，当前仅当filterType为crontab时有效
dayOfWeek - 按周调度
dayOfMonth - 按月调度
dayOfYear - 按年调度
backupInterval - 固定间隔调度
FilterKey.description:
The scheduling frequency. Valid values:

*   **dayOfWeek**: scheduling by week
*   **dayOfMonth**: scheduling by month
*   **dayOfYear**: scheduling by year
*   **backupInterval**: scheduling at a specific interval

>  This parameter is returned only if the value of FilterType is **crontab**.

FilterValue.title: 具体Filter的值
FilterValue.description: The day of a week on which you want to back up data.

DumpAction.title:
转储策略
  Copy - 复制
  Move - 转储
DumpAction.description:
The information about the dump policy. Valid values:

*   **copy**: The backup data is copied from the data source to the destination.
*   **move**: The backup data is moved from the data source to the destination.

RetentionType.title:
保留周期类型
   Never - 永不过期
   Delay - 固定天数过期
RetentionType.description:
The retention type of backup sets. Valid values:

*   **never**: Backup sets never expire.
*   **delay**: Backup sets are retained for a specific number of days.

SrcType.title:
备份策略源类型
  db - 数据库
  level1 - 一级备份
  level2 - 二级备份
  level2Cross - 二级跨地域备份
SrcType.description:
The type of the data source of the backup policy. Valid values:

*   **db**: database
*   **level1**: level-1 backup
*   **level2**: level-2 backup
*   **level2Cross**: level-2 cross-region backup

SrcRegion.title: 备份策略源region
SrcRegion.description: The region in which the data source of the backup policy resides.

DestType.title:
备份策略目标类型
  db - 数据库
  level1 - 一级备份
  level2 - 二级备份
  level2Cross - 二级跨地域备份
DestType.description:
The storage method of backup files. Valid values:

*   **db**: database
*   **level1**: level-1 backup
*   **level2**: level-2 backup
*   **level2Cross**: level-2 cross-region backup

DestRegion.title: 备份策略目标region
DestRegion.description: The region in which the backup files are stored.

BakType.title: 备份类型 F - 全量 L 日志
BakType.description:
The backup type. Valid values:

*   **F**: full backup
*   **L**: log backup

AutoCreated.title: 是否系统自动生成
AutoCreated.description:
Indicates whether the backup policy is generated by the system. Valid values:

*   **true**: The backup policy is generated by the system.
*   **false**: The backup policy is a custom one.

ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

DescribeBackupPolicy.title: DescribeBackupPolicy
DescribeBackupPolicy.description:
### [](#)Supported database engine

PolarDB for MySQL

>  The API operation is available only to specific customers. If you want to call this API operation, request permissions by joining the Database Backup (DBS) DingTalk group (ID 35585947) for customer consultation.

### [](#)References

[Topics related to backup policies of PolarDB for MySQL instances](~~280422~~)

DescribeBackupDataList.summary: Queries the information about the backup data of a PolarDB for MySQL cluster.

schema.title: 实例名称
schema.description: The ID of the PolarDB for MySQL cluster.

schema.title: 地域
schema.description: The region in which the backup set resides.

schema.title: 场景类型
schema.description: The type of the backup scenario. Set the value to **LEVEL\_1**, which indicates the level-1 backup of the region in which the PolarDB for MySQL cluster resides.

schema.title: 查询开始时间，格式：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ
schema.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

schema.title: 查询结束时间，格式：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ
schema.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. The time follows the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format and is displayed in UTC.

schema.title: 备份集状态，OK-备份成功；ERROR-备份失败；
schema.description:
The status of the backup set. Valid values:

*   **OK**: The backup succeeded.
*   **ERROR**: The backup failed.

schema.title: 备份集ID
schema.description: The ID of the backup set.

schema.title: 备份方法：Physical-物理备份；Logical-逻辑备份；Snapshot-快照备份；
schema.description:
The backup method. Valid values:

*   **Physical**
*   **Logical**
*   **Snapshot**

schema.title: 备份模式：Automated-自动备份；Manual-手动备份；
schema.description:
The backup mode. Valid values:

*   **Automated**
*   **Manual**

schema.title: 备份类型：FullBackup-全量备份；IncrementBackup-增量备份；
schema.description:
The backup type. Valid values:

*   **FullBackup**
*   **IncrementBackup**

schema.title: 备份规格：DBInstance-实例备份；DBTable-库表备份；
schema.description:
The backup scale. Valid values:

*   **DBInstance**
*   **DBTable**

schema.title: 分页每页大小，默认为20
schema.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20.

schema.title: 分页页码，从1开始，默认为1
schema.description: The page number. The value must be a positive integer that does not exceed the maximum value of the INTEGER data type. Default value: 1.

schema.title: 实例是否已删除
schema.description:
Specifies whether the cluster is deleted. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false** (default)

schema.title: 实例原地域
schema.description: The region in which the original cluster resides.

schema.title: 数据源ID
schema.description: This is a reserved parameter.
The response parameters.

BackupId.title: 备份集ID
BackupId.description: The ID of the backup set.

BackupName.title: 备份集名称
BackupName.description: The name of the backup set.

BackupMode.title: 备份模式：Automated-自动备份；Manual-手动备份；

BackupType.title: 备份类型：FullBackup-全量备份；IncrementBackup-增量备份；

BackupScale.title: 备份规格：DBInstance-实例备份；DBTable-库表备份；

BackupMethod.title: 备份方法：Physical-物理备份；Logical-逻辑备份；Snapshot-快照备份；

BackupSize.title: 备份集大小，单位Byte
BackupSize.description: The size of the backup set. Unit: byte.

BackupStatus.title: 备份集状态，OK-备份成功；ERROR-备份失败；
BackupStatus.description:
The status of the backup set. Valid values:

*   **OK**: The backup succeeded.
*   **ERROR**: The backup failed.

BackupStartTime.title: 备份开始时间，格式：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ
BackupStartTime.description: The start time of the backup. The time is in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time is in UTC.

BackupEndTime.title: 备份结束时间，格式：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ
BackupEndTime.description: The end time of the backup. The time is in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time is in UTC.

ConsistentTime.title: 一致性时间点：UnixTimestamp秒级时间戳
ConsistentTime.description: The snapshot checkpoint time. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

BackupLocation.title: 备份存储路径
BackupLocation.description: The storage path of backup files.

Engine.title: 引擎类型
Engine.description: The type of the database engine.

SupportDeletion.title: 备份集是否支持删除
SupportDeletion.description:
Indicates whether the backup set can be deleted. Valid values:

*   **0**: The backup set can be deleted.
*   **1**: The backup set cannot be deleted.

IsAvail.title: 备份集是否可用，1-可用；0-不可用；
IsAvail.description:
Indicates whether the backup set is available. Valid values:

*   **1**: The backup set is available.
*   **0**: The backup set is unavailable.

BackupDownloadURL.title: 备份集公网下载链接
BackupDownloadURL.description:
The URL that is used to download the backup set over the Internet.

>  This parameter is returned only when the value of BackupMethod is **Physical** or **Logical**.

BackupIntranetDownloadURL.title: 备份集内网下载链接
BackupIntranetDownloadURL.description:
The URL that is used to download the backup set over the internal network.

>  This parameter is returned only when the value of BackupMethod is **Physical** or **Logical**.

ExpectExpireType.title: 备份集预期过期类型
ExpectExpireType.description:
Indicates whether the backup set expires. Valid values:

*   NEVER: The backup set does not expire.
*   EXPIRED: The backup set expired.
*   DELAY: The backup set expires after a specific period of time.

ExpectExpireTime.title: 备份集预期过期时间，格式：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ
ExpectExpireTime.description: The time when the backup set expires. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time is displayed in UTC.

PolarSnapshot.title: PolarDB二级转储信息
PolarSnapshot.description:
The information about the PolarDB level-2 dump.

>  This parameter is returned only if the level-2 dump feature is enabled for the PolarDB for MySQL cluster and the level-1 backup is dumped.

DumpSize.title: 转储备份大小，单位为Byte
DumpSize.description: The size of the dump backup. Unit: byte.

expectExpireType.title: 备份集预期过期类型
expectExpireType.description:
Indicates whether the backup set expires. Valid values:

*   NEVER: The backup set does not expire.
*   EXPIRED: The backup set expired.
*   DELAY: The backup set expires after a specific period of time.

ExpectExpireTime.title: 备份集预期过期时间，格式：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ
ExpectExpireTime.description: The time when the backup set expires. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format. The time is displayed in UTC.

PageSize.title: 分页大小
PageSize.description: The number of entries per page.

PageNumber.title: 分页页码
PageNumber.description: The page number of the returned page.

TotalPages.title: 分页总页数
TotalPages.description: The total number of pages returned.

TotalElements.title: 总个数
TotalElements.description: The total number of backup sets.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the operation was successful. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

Message.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

DescribeBackupDataList.title: DescribeBackupDataList
DescribeBackupDataList.description:
### [](#)Supported database engine

PolarDB for MySQL

>  This API operation is available only to specific customers. If you want to call this API operation, join the Database Backup (DBS) DingTalk group (ID: 35585947) for customer consultation to request permissions.

### [](#)References

[Back up data of PolarDB for MySQL](~~88172~~)

CreateAdvancedPolicy.summary: Enables an advanced backup policy for a PolarDB instance.

schema.title: 地域
schema.description: The region in which backup sets reside.

schema.title: 实例名
schema.description: The ID of the PolarDB instance.
The response parameters.

Data.description:
Indicates whether the advanced backup policy takes effect. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request failed.
ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

CreateAdvancedPolicy.title: CreateAdvancedPolicy
CreateAdvancedPolicy.description:
### [](#)Supported database engines

PolarDB for MySQL

>  This API operation is available only to specific customers. If you want to call this API operation, join the Database Backup (DBS) DingTalk group (ID 35585947) for customer consultation to request permissions.

ModifyBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the backup policy of a PolarDB instance.

schema.description: The region in which backup sets reside.
The start time of a basic backup.
The ID of the PolarDB instance.
The details of data backup policies.

ActionType.title: 操作类型，CREATE，UPDATE，DELETE
ActionType.description:
The type of the operation. Valid values:

*   **CREATE**
*   **UPDATE**
*   **DELETE**

PolicyId.title: 高级策略ID
PolicyId.description: The ID of the advanced backup policy. You can call the [DescribeBackupPolicy](~~2869783~~) operation to query the ID.

FilterType.title:
高级策略筛选类型
   Crontab - 周期调度
   Event - 事件调度
FilterType.description:
The scheduling mode of the advanced backup policy. Valid values:

*   **crontab**: periodic scheduling.
*   **event**: event-based scheduling.

FilterKey.title:
调度类型，当前仅当filterType为crontab时有效
dayOfWeek - 按周调度
dayOfMonth - 按月调度
dayOfYear - 按年调度
backupInterval - 固定间隔调度
FilterKey.description:
The scheduling cycle. Valid values:

*   **dayOfWeek**: scheduling by week.
*   **dayOfMonth**: scheduling by month.
*   **dayOfYear**: scheduling by year.
*   **backupInterval**: scheduling at a specific interval.

>  This parameter is required only when FilterType is set to **crontab**.

RetentionType.title:
保留周期类型
   Never - 永不过期
   Delay - 固定天数过期
RetentionType.description:
The retention type of backup sets. Valid values:

*   **never**: Backup sets never expire.
*   **delay**: Backup sets are retained for a specific number of days.

SrcType.title:
备份策略源类型
  db - 数据库
  level1 - 一级备份
  level2 - 二级备份
  level2Cross - 二级跨地域备份
SrcType.description:
The type of the data source of the backup policy. Valid values:

*   **db**: database.
*   **level1**: level-1 backup.
*   **level2**: level-2 backup.
*   **level2Cross**: level-2 cross-region backup.

SrcRegion.title: 备份策略源region
SrcRegion.description: The region in which the data source of the backup policy resides.

DestType.title:
备份策略目标类型
  db - 数据库
  level1 - 一级备份
  level2 - 二级备份
  level2Cross - 二级跨地域备份
DestType.description:
The storage method of backup files. Valid values:

*   **db**: database.
*   **level1**: level-1 backup.
*   **level2**: level-2 backup.
*   **level2Cross**: level-2 cross-region backup.

DestRegion.title: 备份策略目标region
DestRegion.description: The region in which backup files are stored.

OnlyPreserveOneEachDay.title: 一天之前的高频备份集，是否只保留每天一个

schema.description: The response parameters.

Data.description: The details of the backup policy.

PreferredBackupWindowBegin.title: 基础备份窗口开始时间
PreferredBackupWindowBegin.description: The start time of a basic backup.

PreferredBackupWindow.title: 基础备份窗口
PreferredBackupWindow.description: The time period during which a basic backup is performed.

AdvanceDataPolicies.description: The details of data backup policies.

PolicyId.title: 高级策略ID
PolicyId.description: The ID of the advanced backup policy.

FilterType.title:
高级策略筛选类型
   Crontab - 周期调度
   Event - 事件调度
FilterType.description:
The scheduling mode of the advanced backup policy. Valid values:

*   **crontab**: periodic scheduling.
*   **event**: event-based scheduling.

FilterKey.title:
调度类型，当前仅当filterType为crontab时有效
dayOfWeek - 按周调度
dayOfMonth - 按月调度
dayOfYear - 按年调度
backupInterval - 固定间隔调度
FilterKey.description:
The scheduling cycle. Valid values:

*   **dayOfWeek**: scheduling by week.
*   **dayOfMonth**: scheduling by month.
*   **dayOfYear**: scheduling by year.
*   **backupInterval**: scheduling at a specific interval.

>  This parameter is returned only when FilterType is set to **crontab**.

DumpAction.title:
转储策略
  Copy - 复制
  Move - 转储
DumpAction.description:
The information about the dump policy. Valid values:

*   **copy**: The backup data is copied from the data source to the destination.
*   **move**: The backup data is moved from the data source to the destination.

RetentionType.title:
保留周期类型
   Never - 永不过期
   Delay - 固定天数过期
RetentionType.description:
The retention type of backup sets. Valid values:

*   **never**: Backup sets never expire.
*   **delay**: Backup sets are retained for a specific number of days.

SrcType.title:
备份策略源类型
  db - 数据库
  level1 - 一级备份
  level2 - 二级备份
  level2Cross - 二级跨地域备份
SrcType.description:
The type of the data source of the backup policy. Valid values:

*   **db**: database.
*   **level1**: level-1 backup.
*   **level2**: level-2 backup.
*   **level2Cross**: level-2 cross-region backup.

SrcRegion.title: 备份策略源region
SrcRegion.description: The region in which the data source of the backup policy resides.

DestType.title:
备份策略目标类型
  db - 数据库
  level1 - 一级备份
  level2 - 二级备份
  level2Cross - 二级跨地域备份
DestType.description:
The storage method of backup files. Valid values:

*   **db**: database.
*   **level1**: level-1 backup.
*   **level2**: level-2 backup.
*   **level2Cross**: level-2 cross-region backup.

DestRegion.title: 备份策略目标region
DestRegion.description: The region in which backup files are stored.

BakType.title: 备份类型 F - 全量 L 日志
BakType.description:
The backup type. Valid values:

*   **F**: full backup.
*   **L**: log backup.

AutoCreated.title: 是否系统自动生成
AutoCreated.description:
Indicates whether the backup policy is generated by the system. Valid values:

*   **true**: The backup policy is generated by the system.
*   **false**: The backup policy is a custom one.

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request failed.
ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

[{"errorExample":"","example":"{
  "RequestId": "D570F209-A166-50C6-98A3-155A20B218B7",

ModifyBackupPolicy.title: ModifyBackupPolicy
ModifyBackupPolicy.description:
### [](#)Supported database engines

PolarDB for MySQL

>  This API operation is available only to specific customers. If you want to call this API operation, join the Database Backup (DBS) DingTalk group (ID 35585947) for customer consultation to request permissions.

schema.description:
The ID of the backup schedule. You can call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~437215~~) operation to query the ID of the backup schedule.

> If your instance is an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance, you can [configure automatic access to a data source](~~193091~~) to automatically add the instance to DBS and obtain the ID of the backup schedule.
The ID of the sandbox instance. You can call the [DescribeSandboxInstances](~~437257~~) operation to query the ID of the sandbox instance.

Data.example: operation forbidden due to sandbox is creating.

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

Success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request failed.
ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

Code.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

Message.description: The error message returned if the request failed.
Message.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

DeleteSandboxInstance.responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Data": "operation forbidden due to sandbox is creating.", "RequestId": "4F1888AC-1138-4995-B9FE-D2734F61C058", "ErrCode": "Param.NotFound", "Success": "true", "ErrMessage": "The specified parameter %s value is not valid.", "Code": "Param.NotFound", "Message": "The specified parameter %s value is not valid." }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"41F0B1A5-A615-5C2E-AC01-D511F040D421 Success true Success","errorExample":""}]
DeleteSandboxInstance.title: DeleteSandboxInstance
DeleteSandboxInstance.description: This operation is available only for the Database Backup (DBS) API of the 2021-01-01 version.
DeleteSandboxInstance.extraInfo:
|Error code|Error message|Description|
|---|---|---|
|Operation.DeniedByJobStatus|operation forbidden due to sandbox is creating|The error message returned because the sandbox instance is being created and cannot be released. Release the sandbox instance when it is running.|

DescribeSandboxRecoveryTime.summary: Queries the recoverable time range of a sandbox instance.

schema.description:
The ID of the backup schedule. You can call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~437215~~) operation to obtain the ID of the backup schedule. If you set this parameter to the backup schedule ID obtained by calling the DescribeBackupPlanList operation, the dbs prefix must be removed. Otherwise, the call fails.

> If your instance is an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance, you can [configure automatic access to a data source](~~193091~~) to automatically add the instance to DBS and obtain the ID of the backup schedule.

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request fails.

Success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request fails.
ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

Code.description: The error code returned if the request fails.

Message.description: The error message returned if the request fails.
Message.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

RecoveryEndTime.description: The end of the time range during which the sandbox instance can be restored. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ format. The time is displayed in UTC.

BackupPlanId.description: The backup schedule of the sandbox instance.

RecoveryBeginTime.description: The beginning of the time range during which the sandbox instance can be restored. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ format. The time is displayed in UTC.

DescribeSandboxRecoveryTime.responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "RequestId": "4F1888AC-1138-4995-B9FE-D2734F61C058", "ErrCode": "Param.NotFound", "Success": "true", "ErrMessage": "The specified parameter %s value is not valid.", "Code": "Param.NotFound", "Message": "The specified parameter %s value is not valid.", "Data": { "RecoveryEndTime": "2021-08-02T12:01:01Z", "BackupPlanId": "1hxxxx8xxxxxa", "RecoveryBeginTime": "2021-08-01T12:01:01Z" } }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"2FC5BFF1-C6AB-594A-9C54-34F9E3A67380 2021-08-30T10:49:18Z 2021-08-23T13:25:12Z 1hxxxx8xxxxxa Success true Success","errorExample":""}]
DescribeSandboxRecoveryTime.title: DescribeSandboxRecoveryTime
DescribeSandboxRecoveryTime.description: Before you call this operation, you must enable the sandbox feature for the database instance. For more information, see [Use the emergency recovery feature of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance](~~203154~~) or [Create a sandbox instance for emergency disaster recovery of a self-managed MySQL database](~~185577~~). This operation is available only in Database Backup (DBS) API of the 2021-01-01 version.

DescribeSandboxInstances.summary: Queries sandbox instances that are created within an account.

schema.description:
The ID of the backup schedule. You can call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~437215~~) operation to obtain the ID of the backup schedule.

> If your instance is an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance, you can [configure automatic access to a data source](~~193091~~) to automatically add the instance to DBS and obtain the ID of the backup schedule.
The ID of the sandbox instance. You can call the [CreateSandboxInstance](~~437252~~) operation to obtain the ID of the sandbox instance.

The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values:

*   30\. This is the default value.
*   50
*   100
The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: 1.

Data.description:
The response parameters.

*   **connectionString**: the connection string of the sandbox instance, in the format of IP address:Port number. This parameter indicates the endpoint of the sandbox instance if the value of the SandboxType parameter is **Sandbox**. This parameter indicates the Network File System (NFS) mount address if the value of the SandboxType parameter is **NFS**.
*   **restoreSeconds**: the time required to create the sandbox instance. Unit: seconds.
*   **restoreTime**: the point in time to which the sandbox instance is restored. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ format. The time is displayed in UTC.
*   **instanceId**: the ID of the sandbox instance.
*   **backupSetId**: the ID of the backup set.
*   **createTime**: the point in time when the sandbox instance was created. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ format. The time is displayed in UTC.
*   **backupPlanId**: the ID of the backup schedule.
*   **vpcId**: the ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC).
*   **vpcSwitchId**: the ID of the VSwitch.
*   **sandboxSpecification**: the specifications of the sandbox instance.
*   **status**: the status of the sandbox instance. Valid values: **running**, **check_pass**, and **stop**.

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request fails.

Success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request fails.
ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

Code.description: The error code returned if the request fails.

Message.description: The error message returned if the request fails.
Message.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

DescribeSandboxInstances.title: DescribeSandboxInstances
DescribeSandboxInstances.description: This operation is available only in Database Backup (DBS) API of the 2021-01-01 version.
DescribeSandboxInstances.extraInfo:
|Error code|Error message|Description|
|---|---|---|
|DBS.NotExisted|no valid job exist with id|The error message returned because no backup schedule exists for the instance specified by the InstanceId parameter.|

DescribeSandboxBackupSets.summary: Queries the snapshots of an instance.

schema.description:
The ID of the backup schedule. You can call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~437215~~) operation to query the ID of the backup schedule.

> If your instance is an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance, you can [configure automatic access to a data source](~~193091~~) to automatically add the instance to DBS and obtain the ID of the backup schedule.

The ID of the backup set. If this parameter is specified, only the snapshot of the specified backup set is returned. If this parameter is not specified, all the snapshots of the backup schedule are returned.

The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values:

*   30: This is the default value.
*   50\.
*   100\.
The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

Data.description:
The returned data. The following parameters are contained:

*   **backupSetTime**: the point in time when the snapshot was created. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ format. The time is displayed in UTC.
*   **backupSetId**: the ID of the backup set.
*   **backupSetType**: the type of the snapshot. A value of **Full** indicates that the snapshot is a full backup snapshot. A value of **Inc** indicates that the snapshot is an incremental backup snapshot.
*   **backupPlanId**: the ID of the backup schedule.

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

Success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

ErrMessage.description: The error message returned if the request failed.
ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

Code.description: The error code returned if the request failed.

Message.description: The error message returned if the request failed.
Message.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

DescribeSandboxBackupSets.title: DescribeSandboxBackupSets
DescribeSandboxBackupSets.description: Before you call this operation, you must enable the sandbox feature for the database instance. For more information, see [Use the emergency recovery feature of an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance](~~203154~~) or [Create a sandbox instance for emergency disaster recovery of a self-managed MySQL database](~~185577~~). This operation is available only for the Database Backup (DBS) API of the 2021-01-01 version.
